General.Name: Huangshan Tourism Development Co Ltd B
General.Description: Huangshan Tourism Development Co.,Ltd. engages in the tourism business in China. The company is involved in the hotel, Anhui cuisine catering, cableway, and travel agency businesses, as well as scenic spot environmental sanitation management, scenic spot ticket management, scenic spot infrastructure construction and management, scenic spot sewage treatment and management, scenic spot material transportation service and management, and scenic spot activities. Huangshan Tourism Development Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Huangshan, China.

4.Name: Mr. Wei  Ding
4.Title: Sr. VP & Sec. of the Board
